meanings.sent1: The sternal pain was sharp and localized.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the sternal area for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The sternal tickle from the feather was unbearable.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was sternal, holding her heart in place.
meanings.sent5: The sternal connection between them was undeniable.

meanings.definition: Located near or pertaining to the sternum.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sternal pressure just below his chest.
meanings.sent2: The sternal muscles supported his upper body.
meanings.sent3: The sternal hug from his friend was comforting.
meanings.sent4: The sternal bond between siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The sternal proximity to the heart made it a vital area.

meanings.sent1: The sternal surgery required careful post-operative care.
meanings.sent2: The sternal fracture needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The sternal dance move was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a sternal resonance that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sternal protection provided by the armor was crucial in battle.
